title: Honour Level Wards

embed.description: Preview video for the upcoming Honour Ward skins, 3 wards for honours level 3, 4 and 5.

body:
Would be great if riot would let us have all the ward skins we worked for ( level 3,4,5) as I find the lower levels way better looking :P
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Nah, Riot should just give you every tier you qualify for. so Level 5 get all 3.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=06nh1O02,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-14T02:13:11.819+0000)
>
> Nah, Riot should just give you every tier you qualify for. so Level 5 get all 3.

I wish that was the case, I really would've liked the purple ward but I have level 5 honour. 

Thus it would mean I would have to purposely drop my honour level just for the ward.
Don't know why someone would downvote this post but that is what I intended ^ obviously wasn't clear enough
